QObject.console.nodejs.error.text:
$$$1 Uncaught exception-There is an uncaught exception, and it was not handled by the domain or'uncaughtException' event handler.
$$$2 - Not used (Bash is reserved for internal abuse)
$$$3 Internal JavaScript parsing error-The JavaScript source code inside Node.js caused a syntax parsing error during the boot process. This is very rare, and generally only appears when developing Node.js itself.
$$$4 Internal JavaScript execution failed-when the boot process executes the JavaScript source code inside Node.js, the return function value failed. This is very rare, and generally only appears when developing Node.js itself.
$$$5 Fatal error-There is a fatal error in V8. The typical message is printed from stderr with FATALERROR as the prefix.
$$$6 Non-function internal exception handling-An internal exception has occurred, but the internal exception handling function is set to a non-function or cannot be called.
$$$7 The internal exception handling failed at runtime-there was an exception that could not be caught. When trying to handle this exception, the handler itself threw an error. This can happen, for example, if an'uncaughtException' or domain.on('error') handler throws an error.
$$$8 - Unused, in previous versions of Node.js, exit code 8 sometimes indicated an uncaught exception.
$$$9 - Unavailable parameters-Maybe an unknown option is not determined, or the required option is not filled in.
$$$10 Internal JavaScript runtime failed-when the bootstrap function is called, the bootstrap process executes the JavaScript source code inside Node.js and throws an error. This is very rare, and generally only appears when developing Node.js itself.
$$$12 Unavailable debugging parameters-The --inspect and/or --inspect-brk options have been set, but the selected port number is invalid or unavailable.

:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc01: ctrl       +   左键单击    添加多光标
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc02: ctrl       +   右键单击    删除多光标
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc03: ctrl       +   左键拖选    添加多选区
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc04: ctrl       +   左键双击    如果点击到了智能双击区域比如if块，会添加到选区里

:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc08: ctrl       +   滚轮        缩放字体
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc09: alt        +   滚轮        横向滚动
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc10: shift      +   滚轮        垂直滚动一屏
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.desc11: ctrl+alt   +   滚轮        横向滚动一屏
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.mouse.subDesc: 以下为鼠标配合快捷键说明，不可自定义
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.project.action.app.publish.b: uni-app发布到字节跳动小程序
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.renameFile.desc: 重命名文件（焦点在项目管理器中）
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.revealFileInTerminal.desc: 在命令行打开文件所在目录
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate01: 左侧是默认快捷键设置，右侧是自定义设置。右侧设置会覆盖左侧设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate02: 自定义快捷键和默认快捷键冲突时会弹出选择菜单。也可在右侧设置添加 'override':true 参数来强制覆盖默认设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate05: HBuilderX的快捷键原则是：不定义记不住的快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate06: 过去的很多工具都提供了太多abcd的快捷键，完全记不住
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate07: HBuilderX在定义每个快捷键时都经过了考量，记住如下原则，就可掌握大部分快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate08: 1. 尽可能保持与OS、浏览器接近
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate09: 如标签卡管理，与浏览器完全相同，ctrl+t新建标签卡、ctrl+shift+t恢复刚关闭的标签卡、ctrl+w关闭标签卡、ctrl+pagedown/pageup切换标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate10: 对于习惯eclipse体系ctrl+t寻找文件的用户，需记得寻找文件的快捷键已经调整为ctrl+p
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate12: 你可以把键盘方位当做屏幕，q为左上角字母，那么alt+q为显示/关闭左侧的项目管理器
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate13: q旁边的w是文档结构图(大纲)，即alt+w为显示/关闭文档结构图
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate14: 右上角字母是p，即alt+p显示/关闭右侧的预览
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate16: alt+x（底部字母）为显示/关闭控制台
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate17: alt+c（底部字母）为显示/关闭终端
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate18: alt+数字，是切换相应位置的标签卡，比如alt+1是转到第一个标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate19: alt+[是在各种括号之间跳转
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate20: alt+d是转到定义（F12也可以），shift+alt+d或shift+F12则是分栏转到定义
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate21: 在windows下，alt+字母同时是菜单的&快捷键，可触发相应菜单功能，比如按下alt+v r，即可展开视图菜单并选中自动换行命令。菜单名称后面括号里的英文，即为对应的触发快捷字母
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate22: 3. ctrl是操作、ctrl+shift是反操作或更多操作、ctrl+alt为更多操作
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate23: ctrl+k是格式化，那么ctrl+shift+k就是合并为一行
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate24: ctrl+w是关闭当前标签卡，那么ctrl+shift+w是关闭所有标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate26: 4. 符号化而不是单词字母化
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate27: 包围的英文是surround，但从这个单词里选一个字母配合ctrl定为快捷键是很难记住的。HBuilderX里ctrl+]是包围，ctrl+shift+]是反包围，这样好记多了
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate28: ctrl+shift+|是给选中行每行设置光标，“|”就是光标的样子，很形象
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate29: 5. 强化和鼠标的配合，更易用
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate33: ctrl+鼠标单击是添加多光标
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate34: 鼠标双击可以智能选中，详见选择菜单
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate35: 6. 老HBuilder用户需注意的常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate40: 7. sublime/vscode用户需注意常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate45: 在每行行首设置光标是ctrl+shift+\而不是ctrl+shift+l
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate46: 选择括号内容是ctrl+[而不是ctrl+shift+m
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate47: ctrl+]是加包围。除了包围tag还支持包围if等函数块。同时提供ctrl+shift+]为反包围
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate49: 选择tag、相同缩进，可以双击tag首尾或缩进符号，不用背快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate51: 复制行或选区是ctrl+insert而不是ctrl+shift+d
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.start.illustrate52: 当然在右上角，你也可以点击下拉菜单，切换其他工具的快捷键方案
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.switchLabelCard.desc: 切换最近的标签卡ctrl+tab，该快捷键无法自定义
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.closeActive: 关闭当前标签卡，不询问是否保存
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.closeAllSav: 关闭所有已保存标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.nextBookmar: 下一个书签（光标在编辑器区域）
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.openEditorA: 切换到最末尾的标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.openPageJso: 转到Page.json（在uni-app的page页面可快速转到Page.json里对应的节点）
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.prevBookmar: 上一个书签（光标在编辑器区域）
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.moveFileToTrash.desc: 删除文件（焦点在项目管理器中）
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.zoomIn.desc: 增大字体【ctrl+鼠标滚动向上】
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings.json.keybindings.workbench.action.zoomOut.des: 减小字体【ctrl+鼠标滚动向下】

:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate01: 左侧是默认快捷键设置，右侧是自定义设置。右侧设置会覆盖左侧设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate02: 自定义快捷键和默认快捷键冲突时会弹出选择菜单。也可在右侧设置添加 'override':true 参数来强制覆盖默认设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate05: HBuilderX的快捷键原则是：不定义记不住的快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate06: 过去的很多工具都提供了太多abcd的快捷键，完全记不住
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate07: HBuilderX在定义每个快捷键时都经过了考量，记住如下原则，就可掌握大部分快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate08: 1. 尽可能保持与OS、浏览器接近
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate09: 如标签卡管理，与浏览器完全相同，ctrl+t新建标签卡、ctrl+shift+t恢复刚关闭的标签卡、ctrl+w关闭标签卡、ctrl+pagedown/pageup切换标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate10: 对于习惯eclipse体系ctrl+t寻找文件的用户，需记得寻找文件的快捷键已经调整为ctrl+p
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate12: 你可以把键盘方位当做屏幕，q为左上角字母，那么alt+q为显示/关闭左侧的项目管理器
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate13: q旁边的w是文档结构图(大纲)，即alt+w为显示/关闭文档结构图
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate14: 右上角字母是p，即alt+p显示/关闭右侧的预览
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate16: alt+x（底部字母）为显示/关闭控制台
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate17: alt+c（底部字母）为显示/关闭终端
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate18: alt+数字，是切换相应位置的标签卡，比如alt+1是转到第一个标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate19: alt+[是在各种括号之间跳转
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate20: alt+d是转到定义（F12也可以），shift+alt+d或shift+F12则是分栏转到定义
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate21: 在windows下，alt+字母同时是菜单的&快捷键，可触发相应菜单功能，比如按下alt+v r，即可展开视图菜单并选中自动换行命令。菜单名称后面括号里的英文，即为对应的触发快捷字母
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate22: 3. ctrl是操作、ctrl+shift是反操作或更多操作、ctrl+alt为更多操作
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate23: ctrl+k是格式化，那么ctrl+shift+k就是合并为一行
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate24: ctrl+w是关闭当前标签卡，那么ctrl+shift+w是关闭所有标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate26: 4. 符号化而不是单词字母化
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate27: 包围的英文是surround，但从这个单词里选一个字母配合ctrl定为快捷键是很难记住的。HBuilderX里ctrl+]是包围，ctrl+shift+]是反包围，这样好记多了
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate28: ctrl+shift+|是给选中行每行设置光标，“|”就是光标的样子，很形象
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate29: 5. 强化和鼠标的配合，更易用
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate33: ctrl+鼠标单击是添加多光标
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate34: 鼠标双击可以智能选中，详见选择菜单
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate35: 6. 老HBuilder用户需注意的常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate40: 7. sublime/vscode用户需注意常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate45: 在每行行首设置光标是ctrl+shift+\而不是ctrl+shift+l
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate46: 选择括号内容是ctrl+[而不是ctrl+shift+m
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate47: ctrl+]是加包围。除了包围tag还支持包围if等函数块。同时提供ctrl+shift+]为反包围

:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_sublime.keybindings.start.illustrate51: 复制行或选区是ctrl+insert而不是ctrl+shift+d

:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate01: 左侧是默认快捷键设置，右侧是自定义设置。右侧设置会覆盖左侧设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate02: 自定义快捷键和默认快捷键冲突时会弹出选择菜单。也可在右侧设置添加 'override':true 参数来强制覆盖默认设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate05: HBuilderX的快捷键原则是：不定义记不住的快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate06: 过去的很多工具都提供了太多abcd的快捷键，完全记不住
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate07: HBuilderX在定义每个快捷键时都经过了考量，记住如下原则，就可掌握大部分快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate08: 1. 尽可能保持与OS、浏览器接近
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate09: 如标签卡管理，与浏览器完全相同，ctrl+t新建标签卡、ctrl+shift+t恢复刚关闭的标签卡、ctrl+w关闭标签卡、ctrl+pagedown/pageup切换标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate10: 对于习惯eclipse体系ctrl+t寻找文件的用户，需记得寻找文件的快捷键已经调整为ctrl+p
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate12: 你可以把键盘方位当做屏幕，q为左上角字母，那么alt+q为显示/关闭左侧的项目管理器
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate13: q旁边的w是文档结构图(大纲)，即alt+w为显示/关闭文档结构图
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate14: 右上角字母是p，即alt+p显示/关闭右侧的预览
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate16: alt+x（底部字母）为显示/关闭控制台
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate17: alt+c（底部字母）为显示/关闭终端
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate18: alt+数字，是切换相应位置的标签卡，比如alt+1是转到第一个标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate19: alt+[是在各种括号之间跳转
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate20: alt+d是转到定义（F12也可以），shift+alt+d或shift+F12则是分栏转到定义
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate21: 在windows下，alt+字母同时是菜单的&快捷键，可触发相应菜单功能，比如按下alt+v r，即可展开视图菜单并选中自动换行命令。菜单名称后面括号里的英文，即为对应的触发快捷字母
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate22: 3. ctrl是操作、ctrl+shift是反操作或更多操作、ctrl+alt为更多操作
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate23: ctrl+k是格式化，那么ctrl+shift+k就是合并为一行
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate24: ctrl+w是关闭当前标签卡，那么ctrl+shift+w是关闭所有标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate26: 4. 符号化而不是单词字母化
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate27: 包围的英文是surround，但从这个单词里选一个字母配合ctrl定为快捷键是很难记住的。HBuilderX里ctrl+]是包围，ctrl+shift+]是反包围，这样好记多了
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate28: ctrl+shift+|是给选中行每行设置光标，“|”就是光标的样子，很形象
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate29: 5. 强化和鼠标的配合，更易用
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate33: ctrl+鼠标单击是添加多光标
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate34: 鼠标双击可以智能选中，详见选择菜单
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate35: 6. 老HBuilder用户需注意的常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate40: 7. sublime/vscode用户需注意常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate45: 在每行行首设置光标是ctrl+shift+\而不是ctrl+shift+l
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate46: 选择括号内容是ctrl+[而不是ctrl+shift+m
:/conf/resources/conf/keybinding_vscode..keybindings.start.illustrate47: ctrl+]是加包围。除了包围tag还支持包围if等函数块。同时提供ctrl+shift+]为反包围

:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate01: 左侧是默认快捷键设置，右侧是自定义设置。右侧设置会覆盖左侧设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate02: 自定义快捷键和默认快捷键冲突时会弹出选择菜单。也可在右侧设置添加 'override':true 参数来强制覆盖默认设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate05: HBuilderX的快捷键原则是：不定义记不住的快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate06: 过去的很多工具都提供了太多abcd的快捷键，完全记不住
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate07: HBuilderX在定义每个快捷键时都经过了考量，记住如下原则，就可掌握大部分快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate08: 1. 尽可能保持与OS、浏览器接近
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate09: 如标签卡管理，与浏览器完全相同，ctrl+t新建标签卡、ctrl+shift+t恢复刚关闭的标签卡、ctrl+w关闭标签卡、ctrl+pagedown/pageup切换标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate10: 对于习惯eclipse体系ctrl+t寻找文件的用户，需记得寻找文件的快捷键已经调整为ctrl+p
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate12: 你可以把键盘方位当做屏幕，q为左上角字母，那么alt+q为显示/关闭左侧的项目管理器
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate13: q旁边的w是文档结构图(大纲)，即alt+w为显示/关闭文档结构图
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate14: 右上角字母是p，即alt+p显示/关闭右侧的预览
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate16: alt+x（底部字母）为显示/关闭控制台
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate17: alt+c（底部字母）为显示/关闭终端
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate18: alt+数字，是切换相应位置的标签卡，比如alt+1是转到第一个标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate19: alt+[是在各种括号之间跳转
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate20: alt+d是转到定义（F12也可以），shift+alt+d或shift+F12则是分栏转到定义
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate21: 在windows下，alt+字母同时是菜单的&快捷键，可触发相应菜单功能，比如按下alt+v r，即可展开视图菜单并选中自动换行命令。菜单名称后面括号里的英文，即为对应的触发快捷字母
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate22: 3. ctrl是操作、ctrl+shift是反操作或更多操作、ctrl+alt为更多操作
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate23: ctrl+k是格式化，那么ctrl+shift+k就是合并为一行
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate24: ctrl+w是关闭当前标签卡，那么ctrl+shift+w是关闭所有标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate26: 4. 符号化而不是单词字母化
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate27: 包围的英文是surround，但从这个单词里选一个字母配合ctrl定为快捷键是很难记住的。HBuilderX里ctrl+]是包围，ctrl+shift+]是反包围，这样好记多了
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate28: ctrl+shift+|是给选中行每行设置光标，“|”就是光标的样子，很形象
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate29: 5. 强化和鼠标的配合，更易用
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate33: ctrl+鼠标单击是添加多光标
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate34: 鼠标双击可以智能选中，详见选择菜单
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate35: 6. 老HBuilder用户需注意的常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate40: 7. sublime/vscode用户需注意常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate45: 在每行行首设置光标是ctrl+shift+\而不是ctrl+shift+l
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate46: 选择括号内容是ctrl+[而不是ctrl+shift+m
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate47: ctrl+]是加包围。除了包围tag还支持包围if等函数块。同时提供ctrl+shift+]为反包围
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate49: 选择tag、相同缩进，可以双击tag首尾或缩进符号，不用背快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate51: 复制行或选区是ctrl+insert而不是ctrl+shift+d
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_intell.keybindings.start.illustrate52: 当然在右上角，你也可以点击下拉菜单，切换其他工具的快捷键方案

:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate01: 左侧是默认快捷键设置，右侧是自定义设置。右侧设置会覆盖左侧设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate02: 自定义快捷键和默认快捷键冲突时会弹出选择菜单。也可在右侧设置添加 'override':true 参数来强制覆盖默认设置
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate05: HBuilderX的快捷键原则是：不定义记不住的快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate06: 过去的很多工具都提供了太多abcd的快捷键，完全记不住
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate07: HBuilderX在定义每个快捷键时都经过了考量，记住如下原则，就可掌握大部分快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate08: 1. 尽可能保持与OS、浏览器接近
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate09: 如标签卡管理，与浏览器完全相同，ctrl+t新建标签卡、ctrl+shift+t恢复刚关闭的标签卡、ctrl+w关闭标签卡、ctrl+pagedown/pageup切换标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate10: 对于习惯eclipse体系ctrl+t寻找文件的用户，需记得寻找文件的快捷键已经调整为ctrl+p
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate12: 你可以把键盘方位当做屏幕，q为左上角字母，那么alt+q为显示/关闭左侧的项目管理器
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate13: q旁边的w是文档结构图(大纲)，即alt+w为显示/关闭文档结构图
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate14: 右上角字母是p，即alt+p显示/关闭右侧的预览
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate16: alt+x（底部字母）为显示/关闭控制台
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate17: alt+c（底部字母）为显示/关闭终端
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate18: alt+数字，是切换相应位置的标签卡，比如alt+1是转到第一个标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate19: alt+[是在各种括号之间跳转
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate20: alt+d是转到定义（F12也可以），shift+alt+d或shift+F12则是分栏转到定义
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate21: 在windows下，alt+字母同时是菜单的&快捷键，可触发相应菜单功能，比如按下alt+v r，即可展开视图菜单并选中自动换行命令。菜单名称后面括号里的英文，即为对应的触发快捷字母
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate22: 3. ctrl是操作、ctrl+shift是反操作或更多操作、ctrl+alt为更多操作
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate23: ctrl+k是格式化，那么ctrl+shift+k就是合并为一行
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate24: ctrl+w是关闭当前标签卡，那么ctrl+shift+w是关闭所有标签卡
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate26: 4. 符号化而不是单词字母化
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate27: 包围的英文是surround，但从这个单词里选一个字母配合ctrl定为快捷键是很难记住的。HBuilderX里ctrl+]是包围，ctrl+shift+]是反包围，这样好记多了
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate28: ctrl+shift+|是给选中行每行设置光标，“|”就是光标的样子，很形象
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate29: 5. 强化和鼠标的配合，更易用
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate33: ctrl+鼠标单击是添加多光标
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate34: 鼠标双击可以智能选中，详见选择菜单
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate35: 6. 老HBuilder用户需注意的常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate40: 7. sublime/vscode用户需注意常见快捷键差异
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate45: 在每行行首设置光标是ctrl+shift+\而不是ctrl+shift+l
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate46: 选择括号内容是ctrl+[而不是ctrl+shift+m
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate47: ctrl+]是加包围。除了包围tag还支持包围if等函数块。同时提供ctrl+shift+]为反包围
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate49: 选择tag、相同缩进，可以双击tag首尾或缩进符号，不用背快捷键
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate51: 复制行或选区是ctrl+insert而不是ctrl+shift+d
:/conf/resources/conf/keybindings_eclips.keybindings.start.illustrate52: 当然在右上角，你也可以点击下拉菜单，切换其他工具的快捷键方案

:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..configurationAttributeDescription.comman: 需要执行的外部命令及参数：
值支持string 和 array 两种形式
填写path环境中包含的命令或具体的程序路径及参数
command值为string: 命令与参数连写，命令或参数包含空格时需要使用""包围
command值为array: 命令与参数分开写，命令或参数包含空格时不需要额外处理
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..configurationAttributeDescription.key.de: 快捷键 [可选项] : 可通过此快捷键直接运行此外部命令
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..configurationAttributeDescription.name.d: 名称，用于在“工具-运行外部命令”菜单中显示
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..configurationAttributeDescription.type.s: process(默认值): 后台运行，运行时不显示输入输出
shell: 在cmd这样的独立shell环境下运行，运行时会打开shell窗口
terminal: 在HBuilderX自带的内置终端插件中运行
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..configurationAttributeDescription.workin: 工作目录 [可选项]：命令运行时的工作目录，默认是文件所在目录
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..example.desc01: 1. 在独立shell窗体下使用dir命令打印当前文件所在目录下文件列表
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..example.desc02: 2. 如安装了Android Studio，可以在avd中新建一个模拟器，然后在HBuilderX中使用快捷键将模拟器直接启动而不必启动AS。注意该终端关闭会导致模拟器关闭，所以更适合在HBuilderX的内置终端中打开
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..external-commands.configurationAttribute: 外部命令 配置属性说明
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..external-commands.start.illustrate01: 配置外层为数组结构，数组内可添加多个外部命令设置
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..external-commands.start.illustrate02: 外部命令可以让您在HBuilderX中通过菜单、快捷键等方式调用外部程序或命令行
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..external-commands.start.illustrate03: 注意: 左侧为教程，不是配置，需在右侧用户设置中添加外部命令才生效
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..external-commands.variableDescription.su: 外部命令 变量说明
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..variableDescription.desc: 'command'、'workingDir'中可使用预定义的变量来获取当前文件的路径信息
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..variableDescription.subDesc01: ${file}             当前文件的完整路径,            比如 D:\files\test.txt
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..variableDescription.subDesc02: ${fileName}         当前文件的文件名,              比如 test.txt
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..variableDescription.subDesc03: ${fileExtension}    当前文件的扩展名,              比如 txt
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..variableDescription.subDesc04: ${fileBasename}     当前文件仅包含文件名的部分,     比如 test
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..variableDescription.subDesc05: ${fileDir}          当前文件所在目录的完整路径,     比如 D:\files
:/conf/resources/conf/external-commands..variableDescription.subDesc06: ${projectDir}       当前文件所在项目的完整路径,     只有当前文件是项目管理器中某个项目下的文件时才起作用

:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc01: Note: This document only supports single-line comments, and there can be no non-blank characters before the'//'!!!
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc02: HBuilderX uses json extension code block, compatible with vscode code block format
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc03: This document has been modified, save it to take effect, no need to restart.
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc04: This document is used for user-defined {1} code blocks.
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc05: The description of each configuration item is as follows:
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc06: 'key': The display name of the code block, the name displayed in the code assistant list. In the following example,'console.log' is a key.
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc07: 'prefix': the trigger character of the code block, which is what letter is typed to match this code block.
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc08: 'body': the content of the code block. The content has the following special format
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc09: $1 indicates the position of the cursor after the code block is entered. If you need multiple cursors, configure $1 in multiple places. If there are preset data at this position, the writing method is ${1:foo1} .Multiple options (used in the drop-down candidate list) ${1:foo1/foo2/foo3}
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc10: $2 means that after the code block is entered, press tab again, and the cursor will switch to the position. tabstops(press tab after the code block is expanded to jump to the next tabstop)
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc11: $0 represents the final cursor position after the code block is entered (you can also press Enter to jump directly).
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc13: Newlines are represented by multiple arrays, one array per line, surrounded by double quotes and separated by commas
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc14: Indent needs to be represented by \t, you can't enter indent directly!
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc15: 'triggerAssist' ：True means that the code prompt is triggered on the first tabtop immediately after the code block is entered into the document, and the code assistant is pulled out. The default is false.
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc16: Each code block uses the key as the primary key, and multiple code blocks need to be separated by commas.
:/conf/resources/conf/snippet_template.j.snippet_template.json.desc17: If the json syntax is illegal, an error message will pop up at the bottom, please pay attention to correct it.
